Title: Chapter 27
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Mahershala Ali
Plot: Frank's approval ratings have plummeted. Doug goes through rehab over his injury. Claire plans to run for Ambassador to the U.N.
